results.title: Metformin restrains ZIKV replication and alleviates virus-induced inflammatory responses in microglia.
results.text_hl: Recent studies suggest that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, an established treatment for @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ may play a role in @DISEASE_Virus_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D014777 @@@viral infection@@@; however, little is known about the interactions between @<m>DISEASE_Zika_Virus_Infection</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000071243 @@@ZIKV infection@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ administration.
